Copy and paste the Keystore file content to the input box directly. Or by producing two-dimensional code of Keystore content, scan and input. Keystore content Keystore password What is Keystore ? Keystore cannot be empty Export Keystore Keystore File QR Code Direct scanning only Two dimensional codes are forbidden to be saved, captured, and photographed. It is only for users to scan directly in security environment to conveniently import wallet. Use in a safe environment Please make sure you use it without any cameras. Once the two-dimensional code is acquired by others, it will cause irreparable asset loss. It has been confirmed that the surrounding unmanned and the camera Show QR Code Hide QR Code Off-line preservation Please copy and paste Keystore files to secure and offline places. Do not save it to the email, Notepad, SkyDrive, chat tools, etc., which is very dangerous. Do not use network transmission Do not transmit Keystore files through network tools. Once acquired by hackers, it will cause irreparable assets loss. It is suggested that the offline device be transmitted through a sweep of two-dimensional code Password safe storage If you need to save online, it is recommended to use the password store software like 1Password, which has higher security level, to save Keystore. Copy Keystore Copied Do not have a screenshot Please make sure there are no cameras around and no cameras! Do not use screenshots or pictures of the way to save the Keystore file or the corresponding two-dimensional code I got it export keystore error

What is Owner ? The Owner represents the ownership of the account and can set permissions to manage Active and other roles. What is Active ? Active is used for daily usage such as transfer, voting, etc. What is Threshold ? Threshold is the lowest weight required while operating. If you confirm that all the permissions under the account are your own key, you can import your wallet with the private key. Trading operations will consume resources. Please pay attention to your memory computing network resources. We recommend that the network and computing resources be at least 0.5 EOS, if your resources are insufficient, your transaction will be rolled back by the block. click check eos account course >> help other create eos account

SMS early-warning Memory early-warning TokenPocket price early-warning is divided into two forms: Price early-warning The price warning is divided into upper price and lower price. \n. When the price reaches a certain location, the system will issue an alarm. The same price will be at most 4 alerts per time, and the daily pushing 12 messages will be the upper limit. \n and price warning are divided into upper price and lower price. Top early-warning The tracking behavior is divided into buy tracking and sell tracking. \n. When the buying and selling reached the set value or exceeded the set value, it was sent by short message. Each set value was alerts 4 times a day, and the number of messages was 12 each time. \n and price warning are divided into upper price and lower price. Note: because there are certain deviations in the network environment in different regions, this service is restricted to tracking and is not applicable to the implementation of the list. This service belongs to TokenPocket value-added service, the cost of the service is%1$s EOS, which is valid for one month,and the final interpretation right belongs to TokenPocket. Once subscription is not allowed, a refund will be made. Open now Phone num Warning is only a price alert, because there is a certain deviation in the network environment, which is not suitable for real-time bills. Cost Price early-warning order Preview Short message warning function has been successfully opened Open short message warning failure Renew Add early-warning Price Rate

Transfer 2 %1$s to the following address by the way of the exchange coin with memo or wallet transfer with memo to complete create account. 0.2 %1$s is used to computing and network resources, and the rest will help users purchase memory. Now the support ways include exchange such as OTCBTC, Gate.io Binance, Bitfinex, or wallet support transfer with memo To(necessary) Steps: Memo(necessary) Cautions

Red rise and green fall Your exclusive code Invite Now You invited %1$s friends，gain %2$s bonus Invitation Rules: 1. During the activity, bind the phone number will gain 100 bonus, each the inviter and invitee will gain 100 bonus, the more you invite, the more you will gain.\n2. Each user can be invite once, you can confirm the invitation while importing or creating the wallet.\n3.Bonus can be exchanged to candies according to rules.\n4.Invite code bind with phone number.\n5.Follow our official telegram group （https://t.me/tokenPocket_en） to follow the exchange rules.\n6.All rights reserved by TokenPocket Invite Friends Take Bonus Code can be verified on Invitation Page Scan To Download Input code to gain bonus Input invite code Code cannot be modified once confirmed, both inviter and invitee will gain bonus. Signing request Properties Contract Do you want to add this contract operation to the white list? You can whitelist this action and do not have to authorize it next time. Checking the radio button next to the attribute means that the property that allows this action can be changed, and will not be whitelisted only if other properties change.
Enter a password to enable whitelisting The whitelist authorization is valid only for a certain period of time during the DApp running. Exiting the DApp or exiting the App will invalidate the authorization. The next time you use the whitelist, you need to enter a password to enable the white name. Whitelist
The delay time cannot be greater than 3888000 seconds (45 days) whitelist

BOS account synchronization No Eos account Successful synchronize %1$d wallets Snapshot took on EOS Mainnet at 2019-Jan-01, 09:50 UTC+0, about block height #35072000, so those accounts not created before this time, will not have related accounts in BOS
Strategy: For non-msig accounts, calculate the balance of an EOS Mainnet account on BOS Mainnet, 20.0000 EOS on EOS Mainnet can get 1.0000 BOS on BOS Mainnet and the accounts whose balance is smaller than 0.5000 BOS will be given at least 0.5000 BOS;
For msig accounts, the balances are calculated as the same as non-msig accounts, and we do an auth mapping of the permissions.
Generate a random name for EOS Mainnet accounts; Accounts are created with: 0.3000 BOS ram, 0.1000 BOS NET and 0.1000 BOS CPU on BOS Mainnet;
Synchronize Sync Bos account according to Eos account

TP Recover
What is TP recovery permission? The registered user of the mobile phone number will have the TP recovery right, and the TP recovery right belongs to the owner authority. The user can recover the private key by means of mobile phone authentication if the user forgets or loses the private key. \nIf the user deletes the privilege or makes the privilege threshold of the privilege lower than the owner privilege threshold, the TP will not help the user to perform private key recovery. When you use your mobile phone number to log in or restore your account, the old public key will be replaced. The new public key will be uploaded locally by the user. iGAS iRAM Buy iRAM Sell iRAM Input iRAM amount(KB)
Buy and sell operations will consume resources, please pay attention to your iGAS and iRAM resources is sufficient Contract Operation
